subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: A voracious collector of Grand Slam titles, Serena Williams has not had the same acquisitive zeal when it comes to the regular tour. This year, however, she is a favorite to win the W.T.A. Championships.
snippet: A voracious collector of Grand Slam titles, Serena Williams has not had the same acquisitive zeal when it comes to the regular tour. This year, however, she is a favorite to win the W.T.A. Championships.
